name: Get Your Greens Hearty Penne
description: Saucy, beefy, and full of good, green stuff—this pasta with Philly-Style Cheesesteak Seasoning is sure to “Philly” you up! Green vegetables like spinach and peas are important sources of vitamins, minerals, and fibre, and can promote immunity, heart health, and strong bones. So, eat up!

ingredients.name: lean ground beef or ground turkey
Philly-Style Cheesesteak Seasoning or Shepherds Pie Seasoning

preparation: Place pasta in Multipurpose Steamer. Stir in 4 cups water. Cover; microwave on high until al dente, 12 min.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large fry pan or wok over medium-high heat. Crumble in beef; cook, breaking up meat using the Ground Meat Separator, until meat is cooked through, 3–5 min.
Stir in seasoning and tomatoes; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, 5 min.
Once cooked, drain pasta, then add to pan. Stir in peas and spinach until warm, 1 min. Taste and season with salt and pepper, if desired.
To serve, spoon into bowls. Add toppings, if desired.
tips: Make it vegetarian by using soy ground round instead of ground beef.
Swap baby spinach for 2 cups favourite frozen veggies.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: Philly-Style Cheesesteak Seasoning (3pk)
summary: An American classic that everyone can make at home in minutes! Bust out your trusty Sheet Pan to roast peppers, mushrooms, and beef with the flavour of garlic and smoked paprika. Layer the mixture on lightly toasted hoagie buns and top with cheese – perfect for a simple weeknight meal or to feed a crowd on game day.

products.name: Shepherds Pie Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Shepherds Pie is comfort food made for today. The recipe is as hands-off as it gets, coming together in one pot in the microwave in just 20 minutes.

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
